modules.name: Data.Incremental
modules.comments:
Incremental computation, based on

> "A Theory of Changes for Higher-Order Languages" by
> Cai, Gairrusso, Rendel and Ostermann.

This module also defines a HOAS-style interface for working with
function changes.

declarations.comments: The monoid `d` of changes acts on values of type `a`.
declarations.title: Patch

declarations.comments:
A type level function which maps a type to the type of its change structure.

Uniqueness of instances makes the coercions `fromChange` and `toChange` safe,
since the functional dependency makes the change structure type unique.
declarations.title: Change

declarations.comments:
A value (`position`) paired with a change (`velocity`).

We can think of these modified terms as conceptually similar to dual
numbers.

We can use functions of type `Jet a -> Jet b` as incremental
functions from `a` to `b`, which gives us a HOAS-style DSL for working
with jets.
declarations.title: Jet

declarations.comments: A constant term
declarations.title: constant

declarations.comments: Create a function which applies a patch to its input
declarations.title: change

declarations.comments: Modify each array element by applying the specified function.
declarations.title: map

declarations.comments: Construct an array from a single element.
declarations.title: singleton

declarations.comments:
Construct an array whose elements can change but whose length is fixed,
from an array of jets.
declarations.title: static

declarations.comments: A change structure for any type with equality.
declarations.title: Atomic

declarations.comments: Change by replacing the current value.
declarations.title: replace

declarations.comments: Change an `Atomic` value using a regular function.
declarations.title: mapAtomic

modules.name: Data.Incremental.Map
modules.comments: A change structure for maps, and helper functions.

declarations.comments: A change structure for `Map` which tracks changes for each key.
declarations.title: IMap

declarations.comments: A change for each possible key.
declarations.title: MapChanges

declarations.comments: A change for a single key is an addition, removal, or update.
declarations.title: MapChange

declarations.comments: Update every key by applying a function.
declarations.title: map

declarations.comments: Update a single key by applying a function.
declarations.title: modifyAt

declarations.comments: Compute the size of an `IMap`, incrementally.
declarations.title: size

declarations.comments: Zip two maps, keeping those keys which are common to _both_ input maps.
declarations.title: zip

declarations.comments:
A change structure for any monoid, with the `Dual` monoid acting by
appending on the left.
declarations.title: Left

declarations.comments: Change by appending a value on the left.
declarations.title: appendLeft

declarations.comments: A change structure for any monoid, acting on itself by appending on the right.
declarations.title: Right

declarations.comments: Change by appending a value on the right.
declarations.title: appendRight

declarations.comments: An incremental property accessor function
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: An incremental property update function
declarations.title: update
